price: The creation of the heavens and earth is far greater than the creation of mankind, but most people do not know.
arabic: لَخَلۡقُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَكۡبَرُ مِنۡ خَلۡقِ ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
